GrailsOAuth2RequestFactory - Class in grails.plugin.springsecurity.oauthprovider.provider
Based heavily on org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.request.DefaultOAuth2RequestFactory which initializes fields from the parameters map, validates grant types and scopes, and fills in scopes with the default values from the client if they are missing.
